mapper.select: select from_id,to_id,content,remote_media_url,date,chat_message_type, if(from_id=#{fromId},true,false) 'self' from (select * from (select tcm.from_id, tcm.to_id, tcm.content, tcm.remote_media_url, tcm.from_time 'date',tcm.chat_message_type from tb_chat_message tcm where tcm.from_id = #{fromId} and tcm.to_id = #{toId} union all select tcm.from_id, tcm.to_id, tcm.content, tcm.remote_media_url, tcm.from_time 'date',tcm.chat_message_type from tb_chat_message tcm where tcm.from_id = #{toId} and tcm.to_id = #{fromId}) tb where tb.date >= #{startTime} order by date desc limit #{limit}) sort_tb order by date;

select from_id,to_id,content,remote_media_url,date,chat_message_type, if(from_id=#{fromId},true,false) 'self' from (select * from (select tcm.from_id, tcm.to_id, tcm.content, tcm.remote_media_url, tcm.from_time 'date',tcm.chat_message_type from tb_chat_message tcm where tcm.to_id =#{xiuxianGroupId}) tb where tb.date >= #{startTime} order by date desc limit #{limit}) sort_tb order by date;
